availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: George T. Humston (Henry County sheriff, circuit court clerk, and farmer)

body.p: A Kentucky sheriff, circuit court clerk, and farmer. Lived in Henry County, Kentucky in 1860. Served as a deputy sheriff in Henry County in 1860. Served as clerk of the Henry Circuit Court from 1863 to 1867. Member of the Masonic Order at the Simpson Lodge, No. 189 at New Castle, Kentucky.

bibl.p: Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Henry County, Subdivision No. 1, p. 23; Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Henry County, District of New Castle, p. 15; Proceedings of the Grand Lodge of kentucky, at a Grand Annual Communication, in the City of Louisville, Commencing on Monday, the 21st Day of October, 1867 (Frankfort, Ky.: Frankfort Commonwealth, 1867), 157. William T. Samuels, Annual Report of the Auditor of Public Accounts, of the State of Kentucky, for the Fiscal Year Ending October 10, 1865 (Frankfort, KY: George D. Prentice, 1866), p. 11. William T. Samuels, Annual Report of the Auditor of Public Accounts, of the State of Kentucky, for the Fiscal Year Ending October 10, 1867 (Frankfort, KY: John H. Harney, 1867), p. 356.
